document.full_text: the capital of country music lives up to its nickname beginning on thursday where some 70,000 fans get the chance to mingle with their musical heroes at the cma music fest.
document.title: nashville marks 40 years of country music festival
lines_and_colors: the capital of country music lives up to its nickname beginning on thursday where some 70,000 fans get the chance to mingle with their musical heroes at the cma music fest.
